name: Wayward Terran Frontier
blurb: Design a star ship and explore a massive galaxy with your friends. Fight space monsters and find some loot. Or be a pirate...

rewards.reward: The most generous of all backer tiers, you have donated a mocha to aid in my constant struggle against decaffeination. I'll think of you while I'm shaking and sweating during an all night programming session.\r\n\r\nAlso if you register for the forums, send me a message an I'll give you a special title only for backers.

Standard issue "you get a copy of the $15 indie game when it comes out" tier. So common they would call it a pre-order if this wasn't Kickstarter. \r\n\r\nThis list includes all of the benefits of being a paid customer once there is such a thing, it includes a steam key if the game is on steam, and you get a backer only title on the forums.

Early bird closed beta access tier. Get access to the closed beta with all previous benefits for less just because you were here early. "That's a dirty marketing trick" -My inner monologue when I made this tier.

Look, I get it, you are pledging before the game goes live, you want something special in addition to the game but you like to maximize your value. Well this is the tier for you: we're going to do one of those exclusive pre-release events called a "closed beta" and this buys you in. We can't let just anyone play the half finished game before we release open beta. Includes previous rewards.

Early bird version of the closed alpha access tier. Get access to the closed alpha with all previous benefits for less just because you were here early. If you buy into this tier, I will yell your name really loud at a box fan so it sounds kinda like Darth Vader is yelling your name. This is the only tier I will do this for and it won't be recorded so only I will hear it. Maybe my neighbors if my windows are open.

Now you are really committed, which is good because this tier is only for the patient and committed types. If a beta is like receiving Christmas early, then Alpha is like receiving a trip to the vet early. You will get to try things early, things like lag, disconnects, character wipes, and bugs. If you're into that sort of thing, sign up here and be the first one to try the game! Includes previous tiers

Galactic buddy program: closed alpha isn't for everyone so it could be lonely and you might want to bring a friend. With this package you can get them access at a premium rate. Same rewards as the previous tier, plus an extra copy of the game and alpha access for one of your friends. This way you can help me find all the multiplayer bugs!\r\n*Note: your friend will have to get his own special title on the forums.

Star engineer special: At this rate I can afford to add another art asset, seems only fair I let you design and name the thing. You may submit a name and a rough design for a ship which will be converted to the art style of Wayward Terran Frontier. The ship will then appear in the game as one of many unlockable ship hulls. Of course if it's named by you, should have it unlocked by default at the start of a new character. Includes tier 3 rewards.

Star Legacy special: Have a story that you think could be told through the world of Wayward Terran Frontier? The game is going to employ a procedural event system that will allow limited types of stories to be told inside the game and I would like to work with you to create a procedural event and/or a story within the constraints of the existing game mechanics and lore. This tier includes tier 4 rewards, also be warned: by participating or even inquiring about this tier you may be exposed to plot spoilers.

By my estimation, anyone donating more than $1000 is not in this for the tangible rewards. Well the rewards are digital and you will have them regardless. That being said, you clearly care about the success of this project more than you do about the specific rewards. You deserve recognition for your contribution and so your name will be rightfully listed in the credits as an official producer right next the rest of the team. As a producer you will have a strong influence over me and my development process, I certainly won't be ignoring your emails. Insufficient thanks for your confidence and support.
============================


Furthermore I will be creating some named NPC characters that will periodically harass players, perhaps akin to a certain Captain Hector if you are familiar with him. With your permission, I would like to name one for you.
